metadata.title: AGRODYKE ‚Äî 6-in-1 Organic Fertilizer | Cameroon
metadata.description: Boost your farm yields by 40% with AGRODYKE, the multipurpose organic fertilizer. Order online via MTN MoMo or Orange Money.

hero.headline: AGRODYKE ‚Äî The 6-in-1 Organic Revolution for Your Farm
hero.subheadline: Boost yields by 40%. Cut costs by 50%. 100% organic. Zero chemical residues.

productOverview.title: What is AGRODYKE?
productOverview.subtitle: A multifunctional organic fertilizer designed for crop nutrition and protection.
productOverview.paragraph1: AGRODYKE is a multifunctional organic fertilizer developed to restore soil fertility while protecting crops.
productOverview.paragraph2: It is a unique six-in-one combination for crop nutrition and crop protection, suitable for all crops.
productOverview.paragraph3: AGRODYKE is a white heavy powder, odorless, non-toxic, and safe for farmers and the environment.

benefits.title: Key Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Highlights from the official AGRODYKE guide.

items.title: Accelerates Plant Growth
items.description: Faster vegetative development and stronger plants.

items.title: Increases Soil Fertility Naturally
items.description: Rebuilds soil health without chemical residues.

items.title: 50% Production Cost Reduction
items.description: Reduce overall input costs while improving yields.

items.title: Works on All Crops
items.description: Suitable for vegetables, cereals, fruit, and plantations.

items.title: Repairs Plant Tissues
items.description: Supports recovery from stress and damage.

items.title: Eco-Friendly
items.description: No chemical residues; safe for export crops.

items.title: Easy to Apply
items.description: Saves labor and simplifies farm operations.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: General application guide from the technical manual.

steps.title: Step A ‚Äî Soaking of Seeds
steps.description: 20g AGRODYKE + 3L water. Store for 1‚Äì2 days before planting.

steps.title: Step B ‚Äî Seed Bed Sterilization
steps.description: 80g in 15L water. Spray 3‚Äì7 days before sowing.

steps.title: Step C ‚Äî Transplantation Sterilization
steps.description: 100g in 15L water. Spray 3‚Äì7 days before planting.

steps.title: Step E ‚Äî Spraying
steps.description: 40‚Äì100g in 15L water. Intervals vary by crop.

howItWorks.disclaimer: AGRODYKE can be mixed with any input EXCEPT herbicides. Wait at least 7 days after herbicide application.

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: The people and mission behind AGRODYKE in Cameroon.
story: He discovered AGRODYKE and recognized its immense potential for African agriculture.
After seeing the damage caused by chemical fertilizers to Cameroonian soils, he became the CEMAC Exclusive Representative.
Through SONEDIS Sarl / SODEPAD Sarl in Douala, he led demonstrations from Ndop rice paddies to Bamenda farms and major plantations.
Our mission: every farmer deserves access to technology that protects both their harvest and the earth.
milestones: 2017 ‚Äî First rubber estate trial in Cameroon

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Reach SONEDIS/SODEPAD for orders or inquiries.

items.question: What is AGRODYKE?
items.answer: A six-in-one organic fertilizer that nourishes and protects crops.

items.question: Is AGRODYKE safe for humans and animals?
items.answer: Yes. It is non-toxic and leaves no chemical residues.

items.question: Can I use AGRODYKE on any crop?
items.answer: Yes. It is designed for all crops and farming systems.

items.question: How much AGRODYKE do I need per hectare?
items.answer: Dosage depends on crop type and application method.

items.question: Can I mix AGRODYKE with chemical fertilizers?
items.answer: Yes, and it can reduce chemical fertilizer needs by 60‚Äì70%.

items.question: Can I use AGRODYKE with herbicides?
items.answer: No. Wait at least 7 days after herbicide application.

items.question: Where is AGRODYKE manufactured?
items.answer: AGRODYKE is internationally registered and distributed in CEMAC by SONEDIS.

items.question: How do I pay?
items.answer: Payments are made via MTN Mobile Money, Orange Money, or WhatsApp.

items.question: Do you deliver?
items.answer: Yes. Delivery details are confirmed during checkout.

items.question: How do I contact you?
items.answer: Use the phone numbers, WhatsApp, or email listed in the contact section.
